mapper.select: select id, banner_photo as `bannerPhoto`, detail_photo as `detailPhoto`, start_date as `startDate`, end_date as `endDate`, promotion_yn as `promotionYn` from promotion_post
mapper.insert: insert into promotion_post(banner_photo as `bannerPhoto`, detail_photo as `detailPhoto`, start_date as `startDate`, end_date as `endDate`, promotion_yn as `promotionYn`)
